Application of systematic inquiry into teachers' formative assessment was ongoing throughout the academic year.   Throughout the course of the intervention, teachers completed and posted a progress report of their findings on a shared online bulletin board, each approximately one month apart. It is not clarified when this stage of the intervention took place. The participating teachers also met on eight occasions during the year for discussion/feedback groups. The final step of the assessment involved teachers posting their final thoughts onto the online bulletin board.
10 sessions over the two month period, approximately 1.25 intervention session per week.
Three times per week, over two days
